messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] num question?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I almost always have my numlock on, because I used to do a lot of scretarial and administrative work and I am very familiar with a ten key.  I perfer using
messages.messageBody:
>My Num Lock is on the 10-key portion of the keyboard
>and when pushed, allows me to use the numbers on
>those keys instead of what is written on the bottom
>of each numbered key: Home or End, PgUp, arrows,
>etc. Hope that is clear
>Carolyn

I almost always have my numlock on, because I used to
do a lot of scretarial and administrative work and I
am very familiar with a ten key. I perfer using the
ten key pad whenever I need to use numbers on the
computer. Those keys across the top of my keyboard
might as well not have any numbers on them, because I
only use them for the symbols.

Nanci K.
